title: manattirai vilagAdO
sahitya:
manattirai vilagAdO unnuDan uyir maruvik-kalavAdO paramporuLE


anupallavi

  ghanatta poi iruLiDark-kaTTugaLellAm viTTun kadir maNi jyOtiyai kaNNArak-kANavE


caraNam    kAlai oLiyinilE kalakkum viN mIn pOlE kaDalinil uppaippOl karumbinil rasam pOlE
mAlaiyil maNigaL pOl shOlai malar maNam pOl mannum tiruvaruLil en vAzhvu layittiDa
